name: Kirill Pimenov
information: I've always enjoyed building websites. From design to development under the hood.

info.about_1: My passion for web development started when I was still in high school. I created simple websites for local companies and worked on small projects for myself.
info.about_2: Since then, I have gained experience in developing projects of varying complexity - from landings to e-commerce platforms.
info.about_3: Technologies and tools I've been working with lately: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS.

contacts.heading: Get in touch
contacts.highlightedPart: i am on the lookout for new opportunities and am open to offers!
contacts.secondPart: If you have ideas, projects or just want to talk, send an email. I promise to reply as quickly as I can.
